import React, { useState, useEffect} from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Form, Button, Row, Col } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Message from '../components/Message' import Loader from '../components/Loader' import { login } from '../actions/userActions' import FormContainer from '../components/FormContainer' import { CART_REMOVE_ALL_ITEMS } from '../constants/cartConstants' const LoginScreen = ({location, history}) => { const [email, setEmail] = useState('') const [password, setPassword] = useState('') const dispatch = useDispatch() const userLogin = useSelector(state => state.userLogin) const { loading, error, userInfo} = userLogin console.log('USER',userInfo) const redirect = location.search ? location.search.split('=')[1] : '/' useEffect(() => { if(userInfo) { history.push(redirect) } }, [history, userInfo, redirect]) const submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault() window.localStorage.clear(); //clear all localstorage dispatch(login(email, password)) // dispatch({ type: CART_REMOVE_ALL_ITEMS }) } return (

Sign In
